<ul>
  <li>The data used in this analysis was recorded from gas receipts collected by me and are available [here](https://github.com/nhoteling/gasreceipts/tree/main/data)</li>
  <li>Seasonal patterns were determined from a time series decomposition via the `forecast` [package](https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/forecast/versions/8.13)</li>
  <li>Website built with `rmarkdown` and hosted via GitHub Pages, based on [this](https://jules32.github.io/rmarkdown-website-tutorial/) tutorial; also see [here](https://www.emilyzabor.com/tutorials/rmarkdown_websites_tutorial.html#R_Markdown_website_basics)</li>
  <li>Code repo is available [here](https://github.com/nhoteling/gasreceipts)</li>
</ul>
